description: Proposed extension to east elevation to create lobby housing new 'WC's (with condensing unit above), single storey extension to rear; raising up of parapet adjacent to entrance from Holloway Road to house second condenser unit to update cooling and heating systems and replacement of fixed glazed panels with 2 x operating top lights (west elevation) fronting Holloway Road.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The design and installation of new items of fixed plant shall be such that, when operating, the cumulative noise level LAeq Tr arising from the proposed plant, measured or predicted at 1 metre from the facade of the nearest noise sensitive premises, shall be a rating level of 5dB(A) below the background noise level LAF90 Tbg.

Note, the measurement and/or prediction of the noise should be carried out in accordance with the methodology contained within BS 4142: 1997.

REASON: To ensure the amenity of the locality is not prejudiced.
